Watson-Filters
==============

Modify and convert values into something else.

For full documentation please see `Read The
Docs <http://watson-filters.readthedocs.org/>`__.

Build Status
^^^^^^^^^^^^

|Build Status| |Coverage Status| |Version|

Installation
------------

``pip install watson-filters``

Dependencies
------------

-  watson-html
